src:
Mexican president says his government does not use Pegasus spyware

06 Nov 2019, 14:20

MEXICO CITY (Reuters) - Mexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said on Wednesday that his government does not use spy software known as Pegasus, which Israeli company NSO Group allegedly sold to the country’s previous government.
Reporting by Sharay Angulo
